goals.description: Angel will simplify and solve linear equations.
goals.baseline: Angel is practicing identifying the operations in an equation and the correct order of steps needed to solve.
goals.target: By 03/07/2022, when given a set of 5 linear equations with one variable (e.g. 2x + 12 = 5x) with whole numbers, Angel will simplify and solve for the variable with 80% accuracy in 4 out of 5 trials.

goals.description: Angel will manage his thoughts and behaviors.
goals.baseline: Angel reports that he engages in certain behaviors that are potentially dangerous without thinking sometimes.
goals.target: By 03/07/2022, with coaching and counseling support, Angel will manage his thoughts and behaviors by reflecting on possible outcomes of his actions, utilizing coping strategies to self-manage and avoid engaging in unwanted/dangerous behaviors with 4 out of 5 opportunities as measured by mental health clinician and teacher observations.

goals.description: Angel will identify colleges or training programs.
goals.baseline: Angel has identified that he is interested in working on cars in design and building.
goals.target: By 03/07/2022, Angel will be able to independently identify three or more colleges or training programs that lead to his career of interest and the entrance requirements needed for each program.

goals.description: Angel will complete a job application.
goals.baseline: Angel is able to complete about 30% of a blank job application with support from a teacher.
goals.target: By 03/07/2022, when presented with a blank job application form, Angel will be able to independently complete all portions of a job application with no more than 3 errors in 3 consecutive trials.

accommodations.description: Accommodations to support learning in all classes.
Access to technology for virtual learning.

services.location: Separate classroom in public integrated facility
Separate classroom in public integrated facility

presentLevels.academic: Angel is currently in 10th grade at KIPP San Jose Collegiate and participates in the Specialized Teaching Program (STP), which addresses academic skills as well as life and vocational skills through a multi-faceted program in the school setting and community-based instruction.
presentLevels.functional: Angel is able to grill and cook for himself, navigate his community independently, take care of his daily hygiene needs, and keep a clean living space.
presentLevels.social: Angel does not display significant social-emotional or behavioral concerns in the virtual learning classroom environment.

extractedData.transitionPlan: Angel's transition plan includes identifying schools or training programs related to his career interests and obtaining a part- or full-time job.
extractedData.behaviorPlan: Angel needs prompts to begin, continue, and complete assignments. Positive praise and a token system will be used as interventions.
extractedData.placementJustification: Angel is placed in the Specialized Teaching Program (STP) to provide the necessary support for his learning needs.
teamMembers: Kyle Markwalter (Cinema and Media General Education Teacher)
extractedData.additionalNotes: Angel's mother expressed concerns about his social interactions and the influence of peers.
